memory.original_query: Query 1: What happened to the stock price of Infosys on https://www.nseindia.com/get-quotes/equity?symbol=INFY today
memory.summarizer_summary: On May 19, 2025, the stock price of Infosys is 24,945.45 with a change of -74.35, according to data from the NSE India website ([https://www.nseindia.com/get-quotes/equity?symbol=INFY](https://www.nseindia.com/get-quotes/equity?symbol=INFY)).

perception.result_requirement: The change in Infosys stock price today based on data from the provided NSE India URL.
perception.reasoning: The user is asking for the change in stock price today for Infosys from the NSE India website. This requires fetching data from the URL and calculating the difference between the opening price and the current price or the previous day's closing price and the current price. This can only be done with a tool.
perception.local_reasoning: Need to fetch the webpage content and extract the stock price information.

data.description: Fetch the raw text content from the given URL to extract the stock price information for Infosys.
